title: Net sales share of Estée Lauder worldwide 2017 , by distribution channel
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Distribution channel Department stores and minimum Distribution channel Salon and spa.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
There is a difference of 39.0 between the maximum Distribution channel Department stores and minimum Distribution channel Salon and spa.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The maximum Net sales share 42.0 is found at Distribution channel Department stores and the minimum is found at Salon and spa where Distribution channel is 3.0.
Distribution channel Salon and spa has 14.0 times less Net sales share than Distribution channel Department stores which is the highest.
The Distribution channel Department stores has the highest Net sales share, followed by Travel retail, and Specialty-multi. Down to the Distribution channel Salon and spa which is the lowest.
Distribution channel Freestanding retail stores, and Specialty-multi share the same value 11.0.
Considered together, the average Net sales share in all 8 Distribution channels is roughly 12.5.
The Net sales share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Distribution channels.
